reviewText:
THIS IS A GREAT PRODUCT TO GET YOU STARTED IN WATCH REPAIR!

This product is excellent for getting you started in the world of watch repair. Do not buy this thinking you will be repairing Rolexes after watching it. This course is designed to teach you the basic and most of all....GET YOU MAKING MONEY!

Waste of time.....DVD is a copy with nothing on it
I have sent it back to Amazon , Amazon still has failed to get back to me
I will never deal online with Amazon ever again..I WANT MY MONEY BACK!!!!
A Lose of $80.00 and 7 weeks,and also had to pay return post.
